body_text:
Clicking the clone button on a recipe leads to a url that contains a double slash, like /recipe/274//clone/. That page 404s.
The fix for this is easy, of course, but we should also have tests that would catch this. It would be nice to verify all links against the global routes object automatically.

title: Clone button 404s with a URL that has a double-slash in it.
body:
Clicking the clone button on a recipe leads to a url that contains a double slash, like `/recipe/274//clone/`. That page 404s.

The fix for this is easy, of course, but we should also have tests that would catch this. It would be nice to verify all links against the global routes object automatically.
